inclusion.criterion: Critically ill patients requiring CRRT for AKI (RIFLE criteria)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent from the patient or legal representative
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pre-existing chronic renal insufficiency requiring dialysis

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant with uncomplicated neonatal jaundice. She does not have any pre-existing chronic conditions that would make her ineligible for the trial.
